job_description:
Role Overview
We are seeking experienced professionals in investment services to contribute to the development and evaluation of advanced AI systems simulating real-world financial workflows across domains such as investment banking, private equity, asset management, and equity research.

Key Responsibilities
- Evaluate investment-related outputs from AI systems for quality, accuracy, and business alignment.
- Calibrate AI decision-making models in valuation, portfolio analysis, financial forecasting, risk assessment, and scenario planning.
- Provide structured feedback and insights to enhance model accuracy and performance.

Ideal Qualifications
- 2+ years of experience in investment services — including investment banking, private equity, asset management, or equity research.
- Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Business Administration, or related analytical fields. Advanced degrees (MBA) or certifications (CFA, CPA, CAIA) are a plus.
- Strong expertise in financial modeling, valuation, market analysis, portfolio construction, and risk-return frameworks.
- Excellent analytical, written, and presentation skills with the ability to simplify complex financial concepts.

Work Details
- Fully remote and asynchronous — work at your own pace.
- Part-time engagement (~20 hours/week).
- Independent contractor arrangement.

Compensation: $90–$150/hour USD (with performance-based bonuses up to $100/hour)
